PageInvestmentInvest.Title: Invest
PageInvestmentInvest.ConfirmSubscriptionMessage: The system will automatically lock the capital of USD 20,000.00 and the lock-up time is 30 days.
PageInvestmentInvest.TermsSubscriptionTitle: Terms & Conditions of Nordlys Investments Income Premium
TermConditionsContent: Each subscription have a minimum amount of 30-day period.
5% premium will be immediately credited to investor's Capital wallet upon subscription.
Subscribed amount will not be available for withdrawal during the 30-day period.
Please read and understand the terms and conditions of the Income Premium agreement.
All terms and conditions are subjected to change without any prior notice. Any updates will be published on our official website.
PageInvestmentInvest.TermsSubscriptionCheckbox: I acknowledge that I have read and understand the terms of this agreement as detailed above.

PageInvestmentIncomePremium.Title: Investment Income Premium
PageInvestmentIncomePremium.SubscribeConfirmMessage: {number} USD will be subscribed to the Nordlys Investments Income Premium for the next 30 days.

PageStartExperienceNumberCode.Title: Activate Pin Code
PageStartExperienceNumberCode.TermsSubscriptionTitle: Nordlys Beta Account Terms and Conditions
TermConditionsContent: Each Beta Account cost $500. Upon purchasing, members will receive a pin code.
Members will need to activate Beta Account with the pin code.
Each member account can only activate the pin code once.
Members can purchase countless Beta Account pin code and allow
All Beta Account pin code must be activated at 23:59 on September 15th, otherwise the pin code will be invalid.

In order to continue to enjoy the benefits of the Beta Account, member must ensure that their investment amount must not be below $500. In the event that the invested amount falls below $500, all benefits of this Beta Account will be forfeited. Member will need to fulfil a minimum invested amount of $1,000 to enjoy any benefits from Nordlys Investments.
Nordlys reserves the right to change any terms of this campaign without prior notice.

UsdtDepositNotes: Use only TRC-20 USDT tokens to make deposits. Non-compatible tokens may result in the loss of your funds. Nordlys Investment Pty Ltd will not be responsible for such loss.
Funds are accredited to your account only after 3 network confirmations.
The minimum deposit is 1USDT. Any deposit lesser than this amount will not be refunded.

PageUsdtWithdrawal.Explain:
TRC20-USDT is the network used for withdrawals. Using other networks will inevitably result in loss of funds. Nordlys is not at anyway responsible for any misplaced funds.

The processing time for daily withdrawal requests is between 0900H and 2100H (GMT+8). Applications received after 2100H will be processed the next day.

The minimum withdrawal amount is 50USDT, and all withdrawals are subjected to a processing fee of 5% and a miner fee of 1USDT.

PageIdentityVerification.DocumentSelectionNote: Only the following document types listed  below will be accepted.
PageIdentityVerification.PassportAdditionalNotes: You are about to upload your passport. Please ensure that:{br}{br}• This is your own government-issued document that is not expired{br}{br}• Ensure that this is an original document, not a scan or photocopy{br}{br}•
PageIdentityVerification.IdAdditionalNotes: You are about to upload your ID card. Please ensure that:{br}{br}• This is your own government-issued document that is not expired{br}{br}• This is an original document, not a scan or copy{br}{br}• Remove any card holders or covers to avoid reflections or blur{br}{br}• Place documents against a solid-colored background. Do not hold the document in your hand.
